title: London/North
name: Harrow School
content: Harrow is famous for its school, Winston Churchill attended it as did 7 British Prime Ministers.  The school is at the top of the hill, the buildings and surrounding area are a step back in time. Try to go in term time on a Sunday as the pupils in long coats and straw boaters, and the masters in mortar boards are a sight rarely seen anywhere outside of Hollywood films of ''Olde England''!
